entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
